text: Plenary is an adjective related to the noun plenum carrying a general connotation of fullness. Plenary may also refer to: *Plenary session or meeting, the part of a conference when all members of all parties are in attendance *Plenary speaker, a speaker at a plenary session, as opposed to a sectional speaker. *Plenary power or plenary authority, the complete power of a governing body *Plenary council, one of various councils of the Catholic Church *Plenary indulgence, a type of religious indulgence *Plenary Group, an Australian company
title: Plenary
